resources.string: Manual Test Analyst by profession, but with a tinge of passion for developer/automation engineer (Yes - I have written UI tests in Android espresso). A passionate techy with a background in Computer Science. Currently, enrolled in an Android developer degree at Udacity. During the course of this degree, I managed to build my mobile applications portfolio: developing a News App, a Data-Storage App- Book Inventory, The Baking App Project, and many more (Check out my Github repo in the link provided below). As a software tester,As a software tester, I am involved in analyzing requirements, writing conditions, designing test cases, and uploading them on the Application Lifecycle Management tool - this is in my DNA now. My role also entails working on smoke, regression, and UAT; defect management, and liaising with the team of developers offshore.Take Away for you: My passion for software development and technology has imbued me with three key skills:Resourcefulness - to research and find solutions to complex problems; Grit - to work through challenges and persevere; Growth - to continue my learning and development.
